titles: The book of Ruth expounded in twenty eight sermons, by Levves Lauaterus of Tygurine, and by hym published in Latine, and now translated into Englishe by Ephraim Pagitt, a childe of eleuen yeares of age
author: Lavater, Ludwig, 1527-1586.
Pagitt, Ephraim, 1574 or 5-1647.
publisher: Printed by Robert Walde-graue, dwelling without Temple-bar,
notes: Running title reads: Lauater vpon Ruth.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Title page partly in MS., with second word supplied as "boor".
keywords: Bible. --  O.T. --  Ruth --  Commentaries --  Early works to 1800.
